decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building. (White Painted Timber)

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (Unnumbered site location plan. Flat 28, Flanders Mansions Plan. Drawings titled: Flat 28, Flanders Mansions, Flanders Road, Chiswick. Received: 18/08/2014. Application valid: 26/08/2014.)and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The shape, design, dimensions, colour and opening style of the windows shall match the existing windows of the building.
description: Replacement of existing single glazed wood sash window with double glazed wood units, painted to match the original windows to the front, side and rear elevations of the property
